sentences.en: A centimeter can be infinitely divided into smaller units.
sentences.cn: 一厘米可以无穷尽地分成更小的单位。

sentences.en: Europe had become infinitely more unstable and fragmented.
sentences.cn: 欧洲已经变得相当不稳定，也越来越分化。

sentences.en: He argued that all matter was infinitely divisible.
sentences.cn: 他坚持所有物质都可无限地分.

sentences.en: He was infinitely more assured than in his more recent parliamentary appearances.
sentences.cn: 比起最近几次在国会中的露面，他表现得自信多了。

sentences.en: His design was infinitely better than anything I could have done.
sentences.cn: 他的设计比我所能设计出的不知要好上多少倍。
人类的适应力是无限的。

sentences.en: Human beings are infinitely flexible and able to adjust when survival depends on it.
sentences.cn: 人类的适应能力是无穷尽的,为了生存可以适应任何环境.

sentences.en: It is infinitely easier to drive a car than to repair it.
She was a wonderful white snow - flower, which he had desired infinitely.
sentences.cn: 她是一朵奇异无比的洁白的雪莲花, 是他梦寐以求的花朵.

sentences.en: The gas molecules are infinitely far apart from one another.
sentences.cn: 气体分子彼此相距无限远.

sentences.en: The integers divide the number line into infinitely many half - open intervals.
sentences.cn: 整数把数轴分成无穷多个半开区间.

sentences.en: There is an infinitely bright future . ahead of us.
sentences.cn: 我们有无限光明的前途.

sentences.en: We have a relationship infinitely superior to those of many of our friends.
sentences.cn: 我们的关系要比我们其他许多朋友的关系好得多。

sentences.en: We realize that we are infinitely small within the scheme of things.
sentences.cn: 我们认识到在大千世界中我们极其渺小。

sentences.en: Your English is infinitely better than my German.
sentences.cn: 你的英语比我的德语好太多了。

无穷小的；无限小的；极小的
无限；[数] 无穷大；无限的东西（如空间，时间）
